tags.name: Suite Test Case
tags.description: Controller to handle Test Case REST calls

tags.name: Test  Plans
tags.description: Work with test plans programmatically using the REST APIs for Azure DevOps Services and Azure DevOps Server.

tags.name: Test  Suite  Entry
tags.description: Reorder test suite entries (test cases and child test suites) in a given test suite.

tags.name: Test  Suites
tags.description: Test suites help in organizing test cases in a test plan. A test suite can contain child test suites, helping you build a folder structure under a test plan or it can contain test cases. Leaf test suites typically contain test cases, where are intermediate suites represent a folder hierarchy. Intermediate suites can on Static type, whereas leaf suites can be of static suites, requirement based suites or query based suites.

tags.name: Test Cases
tags.description: Controller to handle WIT scoped TestCase APIs

tags.name: Test Point
tags.description: Controller to handle Test Point REST calls

tags.name: Test Suite Clone
tags.description: Work with cloning test plans and test suites programmatically using the REST APIs for Azure DevOps Services and Azure DevOps Server.

get.description: Find the list of all test suites in which a given test case is present. This is helpful if you need to find out which test suites are using a test case, when you need to make changes to a test case.

get.description: Get Test Case List return those test cases which have all the configuration Ids as mentioned in the optional parameter. If configuration Ids is null, it return all the test cases
get.operationId: Suite Test Case_Get Test Case List

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: ID of the test plan for which test cases are requested.

parameters.name: suiteId
parameters.description: ID of the test suite for which test cases are requested.

parameters.name: testIds
parameters.description: Test Case Ids to be fetched.

parameters.name: configurationIds
parameters.description: Fetch Test Cases which contains all the configuration Ids specified.

parameters.name: witFields
parameters.description: Get the list of witFields.

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: If the list of test cases returned is not complete, a continuation token to query next batch of test cases is included in the response header as "x-ms-continuationtoken". Omit this parameter to get the first batch of test cases.

parameters.name: returnIdentityRef
parameters.description: If set to true, returns all identity fields, like AssignedTo, ActivatedBy etc., as IdentityRef objects. If set to false, these fields are returned as unique names in string format. This is false by default.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: If set to false, will get a smaller payload containing only basic details about the suite test case object

parameters.name: excludeFlags
parameters.description: Flag to exclude various values from payload. For example to remove point assignments pass exclude = 1. To remove extra information (links, test plan , test suite) pass exclude = 2. To remove both extra information and point assignments pass exclude = 3 (1 + 2).

values.description: To exclude nothing
To exclude point assignments, pass exclude = 1
To exclude extra information (links, test plan, test suite), pass exclude = 2

parameters.description: If set to true, will also fetch test points belonging to child suites recursively.

cloneStatistics.description: Various statistics related to the clone operation

values.description: value for Failed State
value for Inprogress state
Value for Queued State
value for Success state

CloneOptions.description: Clone options for cloning the test suite.

cloneRequirements.description: If set to true requirements will be cloned

copyAllSuites.description: copy all suites from a source plan

destinationWorkItemType.description: Name of the workitem type of the clone

overrideParameters.description: Key value pairs where the key value is overridden by the value.

relatedLinkComment.description: Comment on the link that will link the new clone  test case to the original Set null for no comment

clonedRequirementsCount.description: Number of requirements cloned so far.

clonedSharedStepsCount.description: Number of shared steps cloned so far.

clonedTestCasesCount.description: Number of test cases cloned so far

totalRequirementsCount.description: Total number of requirements to be cloned

totalTestCasesCount.description: Total number of test cases to be cloned

CloneTestPlanOperationInformation.description: Response for Test Plan clone operation

cloneOperationResponse.description: Various information related to the clone

CloneTestPlanParams.description: Parameters for Test Plan clone operation

CloneTestSuiteOperationInformation.description: Response for Test Suite clone operation

clonedTestSuite.description: Information of newly cloned Test Suite

cloneOperationResponse.description: Various information related to the clone

CloneTestSuiteParams.description: Parameters for Test Suite clone operation

configurationId.description: Id of the Configuration Assigned to the Test Point

DestinationTestSuiteInfo.description: Destination Test Suite information for Test Suite clone operation

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

LastResultDetails.description: Last result details of test point.

LibraryWorkItemsData.description: This data model is used in Work item-based tabs of Test Plans Library.

continuationToken.description: Continuation token to fetch next set of elements. Present only when HasMoreElements is true.

exceededWorkItemQueryLimit.description: Boolean indicating if the WIQL query has exceeded the limit of items returned.

hasMoreElements.description: Boolean indicating if there are more elements present than what are being sent.

returnCode.description: Specifies if there was an error while execution of data provider.

workItemIds.description: List of work items returned when OrderByField is sent something other than Id.

workItems.description: List of work items to be returned.

LibraryWorkItemsDataProviderRequest.description: This is the request data contract for LibraryTestCaseDataProvider.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token required for paging of work items. This is required when getting subsequent sets of work items when OrderByField is Id.

filterValues.description: List of filter values to be supplied. Currently supported filters are Title, State, AssignedTo, Priority, AreaPath.

isAscending.description: Whether the data is to be sorted in ascending or descending order. When not supplied, defaults to descending.

libraryQueryType.description: The type of query to run.

orderByField.description: Work item field on which to order the results. When not supplied, defaults to work item IDs.

workItemIds.description: List of work items to query for field details. This is required when getting subsequent sets of work item fields when OrderByField is other than Id.

configurationName.description: Name of the Configuration Assigned to the Test Point

tester.description: Tester Assigned to the Test Point

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

definitionId.description: ID of the release definition that contains the release environment definition.

environmentDefinitionId.description: ID of the release environment definition.

values.description: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
Test has not been completed, or the test type does not report pass/failure.
Test was executed w/o any issues.
Test was executed, but there were issues. Issues may involve exceptions or failed assertions.
Test has completed, but we can't say if it passed or failed. May be used for aborted tests...
The test timed out
Test was aborted. This was not caused by a user gesture, but rather by a framework decision.
Test had it chance for been executed but was not, as ITestElement.IsRunnable == false.
Test was not executed. This was caused by a user gesture - e.g. user hit stop button.
To be used by Run level results. This is not a failure.
There was a system error while we were trying to execute a test.
Test is Not Applicable for execution.
Test is paused.
Test is currently executing. Added this for TCM charts
Test is not impacted. Added fot TIA.

Child Suite

TeamProjectReference.description: Represents a shallow reference to a TeamProject.

defaultTeamImageUrl.description: Url to default team identity image.

values.description: Project is in the process of being deleted.
Project is in the process of being created.
Project is completely created and ready to use.
Project has been queued for creation, but the process has not yet started.
All projects regardless of state.
Project has not been changed.
Project has been deleted.

url.description: Url to the full version of the object.

values.description: The project is only visible to users with explicit access.
The project is visible to all.

order.description: Order of the TestCase in the Suite

pointAssignments.description: List of Points associated with the Test Case

Have the field values separated by an AND clause.

configuration.description: Configuration associated with the Test Point

lastResetToActive.description: Last Reset to Active Time Stamp for the Test Point

failureType.description: Failure Type for the Test Point

lastResultDetails.description: Last Result Details for the Test Point

values.description: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
Test is in the execution queue, was not started yet.
Test has been queued. This is applicable when a test case is queued for execution
Test is currently executing.
Test has been paused. This is applicable when a test case is paused by the user (For e.g. Manual Tester can pause the execution of the manual test case)
Test has completed, but there is no quantitative measure of completeness. This may apply to load tests.

lastRunBuildNumber.description: Last RUn Build Number for the Test Point

lastTestRunId.description: Last Test Run Id for the Test Point

values.description: Only used during an update to preserve the existing value.
Test has not been completed, or the test type does not report pass/failure.
Test was executed w/o any issues.
Test was executed, but there were issues. Issues may involve exceptions or failed assertions.
Test has completed, but we can't say if it passed or failed. May be used for aborted tests...
The test timed out
Test was aborted. This was not caused by a user gesture, but rather by a framework decision.
Test had it chance for been executed but was not, as ITestElement.IsRunnable == false.
Test was not executed. This was caused by a user gesture - e.g. user hit stop button.
To be used by Run level results. This is not a failure.
There was a system error while we were trying to execute a test.
Test is Not Applicable for execution.
Test is paused.
Test is currently executing. Added this for TCM charts
Test is not impacted. Added fot TIA.
Default
The test point needs to be executed in order for the test pass to be considered complete.  Either the test has not been run before or the previous run failed.
The test has passed successfully and does not need to be re-run for the test pass to be considered complete.
The test point needs to be executed but is not able to.
The test is being executed.

id.description: Id of Test Point to be updated

isActive.description: Reset the Test Point to Active

TestSettings.description: Represents the test settings of the run. Used to create test settings and fetch test settings

areaPath.description: Area path required to create test settings

description.description: Description of the test settings. Used in create test settings.

isPublic.description: Indicates if the tests settings is public or private.Used in create test settings.

machineRoles.description: Xml string of machine roles. Used in create test settings.

children.description: Child test suites of current test suite.

hasChildren.description: Boolean value dictating if Child test suites are present

lastUpdatedBy.description: IdentityRef of user who has updated test suite recently.

plan.description: Test plan to which the test suite belongs.

values.description: Default suite type
Query Based test Suite
Static Test Suite
Requirement based Test Suite

inheritDefaultConfigurations.description: Default configuration was inherited or not.

queryString.description: Test suite query string, for dynamic suites.

TestVariableCreateUpdateParameters.description: Test Variable Create or Update Parameters

values.description: List of allowed values

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialized collections as a single JSON object on the wire, to avoid serializing JSON arrays directly to the client, which can be a security hole

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '6.0-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.2.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.2.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '6.0-preview.2' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.test: Grants the ability to read test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.
scopes.vso.test_write: Grants the ability to read, create, and update test plans, cases, results and other test management related artifacts.
